title: Musk and Trump ratchet up involvement in Wisconsin Supreme Court race
summary: Musk’s PAC has poured $18 million into Wisconsin's Supreme Court race, where Tesla has a lawsuit challenging the state's “factory store” law, which prohibits vehicle manufacturers from directly selling cars
